name: Interactive Mapping
author: Cregy	, susheelhbti

sections.description:
The Interactive Mapping plugin creates two new menus in the admin sidebar which will allow you to:
* Add a map using co-ordinates from Open Street Map
* Set a zoom level
* Create a marker
* Add the marker to any or all maps created
* Uses short codes so maps can be added to any page or post
* Uses category slug so you can create a map of a town say Lostwithiel and then create a category called Lostwithiel and only add markers using that category

In order to feature a marker on a certain map we have created a shortcode. There are instances where the marker might not show because of a wrong ID or category slug.
sections.installation:
Easy Way:
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
2. Search for ‘Interactive Mapping’
Activate Interactive Mapping from your Plugins page.

Slightly harder way:
From WordPress.org
Download Interactive Mapping.
Upload the ‘interactive-mapping’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
Activate Interactive Mapping from your Plugins page.

short_description: Adds the ability to create an interactive map using Open Street Map and adding markers with text
